mapper.select:
select
from MSQGL_DETAILED where MSQGL_DETAILED_ID = #{msqglDetailedId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by MSQGL_DETAILED_ADDTIME

from MSQGL_DETAILED where JTJLK_ID = #{jlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by MSQGL_DETAILED_ADDTIME

from MSQGL_DETAILED where MSQGL_DETAILED_LSZH_ID = #{msqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by MSQGL_DETAILED_ADDTIME

from MSQGL_DETAILED where JTJLK_ID = #{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by MSQGL_DETAILED_ADDTIME
select DISTINCT MSQGL_DETAILED_MSLB, JTJLK_ID from MSQGL_DETAILED where JTJLK_ID = #{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(*) from MSQGL_DETAILED where MSQGL_DETAILED_DELFLAG=1
and MSQGL_DETAILED_ID = #{keywords}
mapper.delete: delete from MSQGL_DETAILED where MSQGL_DETAILED_LSZH_ID = #{msqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and MSQGL_DETAILED_MSG = #{msgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
